Lunarpine smiled at Ice's mental message. "Me too, You think you can 
handle a sparring session with me?"

"You mean us don't you?" Razor Claw inturupted, "If theres a 
competition then I'm in." He seemed rather sure of himself and fealt 
he had something to prove.

"OK, you're in." Lunarpine concluded that if he wanted an excuse to 
kick this newcomers tail he'd take any opportunity that came his way.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She smiled. "It's good to have you on our side, that's for sure." 
She 
> smiled at Lunarpine. "See, it's not hard to make friends." She 
walked 
> over to the computer.  She picked up the clipboard and pen and 
> started to jot things down. The clipboard floated in the air and 
the 
> pen was writing, but no one was holding it. Ice smiled as she 
watches 
> this. She was liking her new abilities.  She started to take notes 
on 
> her fighting and decided to try to find betters ways. She wanted to 
> be a better fighter and not use her powers so much. It drained her 
> when she over used them. She looked back at Razor Claw and 
Lunarpine.
> "You know, maybe you both can help me. I wasn't much a fighter 
before 
> I became this new form. But Now that I am bigger and stronger, I 
will 
> need to learn how to fight better. After ,"sighs," class, perhaps 
we 
> can spar and I can learn how to better fight?"
> 
> She send the mental message to Lunarpine. "I missed sparring with 
> you."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Razor Claw smiled an ominous grin, "Better than Maximals or 
> Predacons 
> > huh? I think I like that." He raised his hand and placed it on 
the 
> > facing of the CR chamber "If what you believe is true than I will 
> > fight by you." he thought of the alternative "And if what you say 
> is 
> > wrong than I will die by you." A pledge of loyalty that could be 
> > fealt as well as heard.
> > 
> > Lunarpine stepped forward and placed a hand on Ice's 
> shoulder, "Looks 
> > like you got a fan club." He didn't like the devotion that Razor 
> Claw 
> > was showing to Ice, Predacons had a tendancy to change devotions 
> like 
> > humans change socks, and both stunk.
> >
